entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
